title: haha! fyndið kisuvideo!
text:
þið verið að sjá þessar klaufakisur, skoðið þetta: http://www.batman.is/ut/20850

______________________________________________ Sometimes I wish I was brave I wish I was stronger I wish I could feel no pain I wish I was young I wish I would shy I wish I was honest I wish I was you not I 'Cause I feel so mad I feel so angry I feel so callused So lost, confused, again I feel so cheap So used, unfaithful Let's start over Let's start over -Feel so Boxcar racer _____________________________________________ Við erum geimverur
